reference.title: cxxNamespaceDefinition
reference.shortdesc: Has child elements providing further information about a C++ namespace.

section.title: Description
section.p: The <cxxNamespaceDefinition> element requires the child element <cxxNamespaceAPIItemLocation>.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <cxxNamespaceDefinition> <cxxNamespaceAccessSpecifier value="public"/> <cxxNamespaceDerivations> <cxxNamespaceDerivation> <cxxNamespaceDerivationAccessSpecifier value="public"/> <cxxNamespaceBaseClass href="namespace.xml#namespace">CBase</cxxNamespaceBaseClass> </cxxNamespaceDerivation> </cxxNamespaceDerivations> <cxxNamespaceAPIItemLocation> <cxxNamespaceDeclarationFile name="filePath" value="C:/src/include/e32base.h"/> <cxxNamespaceDeclarationFileLine name="lineNumber" value="2812"/> </cxxNamespaceAPIItemLocation> </cxxNamespaceDefinition>
